functions: Developed and deployed additional functions to the Security Learning Academy Portal (SLAP) with PHP and JavaScript to streamline the course lifecycle for Security Learning Services (SLS) content and ideation developers.

Aided in the curation of SLS Process and Style Guides to ensure consistency of the courses on the SLA.

Designed, developed, and implemented new web user interfaces (UI) with Adobe XD, HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap for the Security Learning Academy (SLA) website to parallel the elements of IBMâ€™s Carbon Design System.
Examined the accessibility of SLA website against Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) to improve end-user experience and usability.
Customized presentation frameworks to assist Security Learning Services (SLS) content developers in demonstrating course learning materials to SLA clients.
Transformed client relationship manager UI from Salesforce Classic to Salesforce Lightning Experience.
Presented novel UI proof of concepts to TCW directors and senior managers.
Facilitated in the deployment of new Salesforce UI to project managers.
